hero.heading: Environmentally Friendly Options
hero.copy: Make sure your interior doors have a positive impact on the environment, both inside and outside your home.
hero.direction: Things to look for while you shop

inspiration.heading: Sustainable materials
copy: Whether you’re drawn to solid wood or composite doors, each material has environmentally-friendly options. For example, knotty pine wood is rapidly renewable, and most composite doors are made from recycled materials.

inspiration.heading: Low emissions
copy: A new door should be a breath of fresh air. It shouldn’t make your air hazardous. Look for doors made with low emission sealants and without added formaldehyde.

next.heading: Now, let’s look at safety considerations.
next.copy: Hopefully you never have to worry about a fire in your home, but it’s always better to be prepared.
